title: Enhancing Customer Experience Competencies: Blended Learning for Secondary Science Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze scientific experiment data in a blended learning environment and write a report.
Learners can systematically explain scientific concepts by linking digital content with offline activities.
Learners can evaluate strategies for utilizing blended learning tools through team-based projects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
